City staff took a tour of the SUSTAIN Laboratory wave tank at @UMiamiRSMAS to learn about the use of artificial reefs to reduce wave energy. Projects such as these not only embrace our marine ecosystems but promote coastal resilience in the face of storms! #MBRisingAbovepic.twitter.com/1ndaDL3iKp
